mainText:
Bank of Entitlement Promo: "Bank of Entitlement, where your delusions become reality-get your VIP gold card today!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into the Bank of Entitlement, expecting a red carpet welcome, naturally. But what do I see? No red carpet. I'm like, hold up, do they not know who I am? So, I casually mention it to the manager and bam! Next day, not just a red carpet, but a velvet rope entrance with paparazzi waiting. That's more like it. Who needs humility when you've got entitlement, am I right?
